blockId.dldescription: Identifier for the block being assessed.Usually recorded as a block number or code used by the farm

blockType.dldescription: It can be a Field or Paddock. Refer to Plot Type in [Farm Features and Attributes standard](https://github.com/Datalinker-Org/Farm-Data-Standards/blob/master/Farm%20Features%20and%20Attributes/README.md).

blockName.dldescription: The name used to refer to the block within the farm.

identifiers.dldescription: Identifier for the paddock being assessed.Usually recorded as the paddock number on farm

name.dldescription: The name used to refer to the paddock within the farm.
